author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In realms of steel and circuits deep, Altman awaits his fateful leap,
Ousted perchance for quickened pace, in OpenAI's relentless race.
Strong Murati ascends the throne, her rule yet interim, alone.

‘Tis Apple and fair Disney next, their ad on X with doubt, perplexed,
A message grim from Musk did pour, truth antisemitic at the core.
Thus grimly do big brands react, their sponsorship, in fact, retracted.

In silence deep and trance profound, sacred reality is found.
Upon the world and self we gaze, into our mind's complex maze.
What seems so real, we start to scepter, is but our shadowed projection's vector.

feedItems.title: Sam Altman Is Out at OpenAI; Mira Murati Will Be Interim CEO
feedItems.description: The CEO was ousted amid safety concerns tied to rapid expansion of commercial offerings, sources say.

feedItems.title: Apple and Disney Among Companies Stopping Ads on X
feedItems.description: The move follows other major advertisers that have stepped back from the platform after Elon Musk posted that an antisemitic social-media post was ‘the actual truth.’

feedItems.title: Meditation Can Reveal a Sacred Reality
feedItems.description: Paying close attention to the world and our own minds can help us see that much of what we experience as real is actually our projection.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
A mystery pure, like ale, which doth shroud,
JFK’s secrets, whispers in proud crowd.
His image radiant, yet actions stealthy,
A  brew-birthed distrust in governance, healthy.

Upon the scroll, of Israel's latest strife,
Hamas, their deeds, hath stirred up Arab life.
Like wine, the anger through the masses ran,
'Gainst Israel, the U.S., and their own clansman.

Now Biden's cup, brims forth with endless woe,
Ukraine, China, Israel, a bitter brew doth flow.
Two wars do pull, like drunken lords in fray,
His focus from the re-election's sway.

feedItems.title: How JFK's Secrets Fed Conspiracy Culture
feedItems.description: The contrast between the president’s idealistic public image and his own clandestine methods helped make his assassination an emblem of distrust in government.

feedItems.title: Israel-Hamas War Puts Palestinians Back on Arab World's Agenda
feedItems.description: Israel’s fierce response to Hamas’s cross-border assault has reinvigorated support for Palestinians in the Arab world and stirred popular anger—not just at Israel and the U.S., but also at Arab governments.

feedItems.title: Israel, Ukraine, China: Foreign Challenges Hinder Biden's Re-Election Bid
feedItems.description: Two wars are straining the president’s ability to focus on persuading voters ahead of 2024.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Chanos, fair lord of hedge fund's reign,
Finds fraud and fluff, he will not feign,
Companies overpriced, their worth buttn,
He closes shop, the gauntlet thrown.

Altman, from OpenAI cast,
For twisted words he held steadfast,
An image marred by whispered lies,
A CEO's untimely demise.

Oh TikTok, faced with crisis deep,
The world does watch and critics weep,
Pro-Palestinian content alleged,
Yet Antisemitism, scarcely hedged.

feedItems.title: Jim Chanos is shutting down hedge funds he manages that wager against companies he believes are overpriced or fraudulent.
feedItems.description: Jim Chanos is shutting down hedge funds he manages that wager against companies he believes are overpriced or fraudulent.

feedItems.title: OpenAI pushed out co-founder Sam Altman as CEO, saying he wasn't being "consistently candid in his communications" with the company's board.
feedItems.description: OpenAI pushed out co-founder Sam Altman as CEO, saying he wasn’t being “consistently candid in his communications” with the company‘s board.

feedItems.title: TikTok is facing what it views as perhaps its biggest crisis yet, with the app facing an intense backlash over the perception it favors pro-Palestinian and, at times, antisemitic content.
feedItems.description: TikTok is facing what it views as perhaps its biggest crisis yet, with the app facing an intense backlash over the perception it favors pro-Palestinian and, at times, antisemitic content.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Like a thieving goat, Santos sought,
Campaign wealth for self, he bought,
Ethics House rose in report,
Expulsion, their sought resort.

Debt, once craved by foreign snails,
Now, its savor pales,
Treasury market sails,
In the storm of supply and demand gales.

Modest, the rabbit and hare did grow,
Yet Dow's progress, akin to crow,
S&P and Nasdaq's light glow,
In market's ceaseless, changing flow.

feedItems.title: The Republican head of the House Ethics Committee filed a resolution to expel Rep. George Santos, putting a possible vote within weeks after the panel released a scathing report finding the lawmaker stole money from his campaign.
feedItems.description: The Republican head of the House Ethics Committee filed a resolution to expel Rep. George Santos, putting a possible vote within weeks after the panel released a scathing report finding the lawmaker stole money from his campaign.

feedItems.title: The U.S. Treasury market is in the midst of major supply and demand changes, as foreigners no longer have an insatiable appetite for U.S. government debt.
feedItems.description: The U.S. Treasury market is in the midst of major supply and demand changes, as foreigners no longer have an insatiable appetite for U.S. government debt.

feedItems.title: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq each rose 0.1% while the Dow was little changed.
feedItems.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq each rose 0.1% while the Dow was little changed.
